Text.Page:
Shina needs help at Firebase Valorâ€”it's northeast of here, in Molten Reach.

I don't know what she needs, but she wouldn't ask for help if the situation weren't dire.

If you can kill shurians, we can put you to work here.

Go talk to Tifane.

We suspect the shurians are here to snatch something from Bahaar's fiery grasp.

It's some ancient animosity from the Divine War. The details elude me.

Regardless, they're a menace we can do without.
